content: @Alex Crichton I'd like to announce pipelining on dev-platform so that Firefox developers can start using it. Can you think of any reason not to do so? Anything I should mention? I could draft the email and run it by you first, if that helps.
Seems reasonable to me! Just make sure to clarify that it's susceptible to break at any time but we'll work to fix it quickly and are looking to stabilize as well, so bug reports are appreciated!
For posterity, here is the dev-platform post. No replies so far...
